title.value: Роль патоморфологических исследований в диагностике инфекционной анемии цыплят при моно- и ассоциативном течении
The role of pathmorphological study in the diagnosis of chicken infectious anaemia in the mono- and associative course of disease

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Selikhanova, M.K., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)
Burlakov M.V., St.-Peterburg State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Russian Federation)

abstract.value: The article deals with pathomorphological changes in chickens during the experimental and spontaneous course of infectious anaemia. Characteristics of clinical and pathoanatomical manifestation of infectious anaemia associated with infectious bursal disease, reovirus and metapneumovirus infection have been described. The role of histologic studies in the diagnosis of mono- and associative course of infectious chicken anaemia has been shown
